title: TUI Group
summary: TUI A.G (short for "Touristik Union International Aktiengesellschaft"), also known as TUI Group A.G, is a German multinational travel and tourism company headquartered in Hanover, Germany.[3] It is the largest leisure, travel and tourism company in the world,[4] and it owns travel agencies, hotels, airlines, cruise ships and retail shops. The group owns five European airlines — the largest holiday fleet in Europe — and several tour operators based in Europe.
